issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Parameter Property Type "CommaDelimitedList" Causes InternalFailure Error
fields.environment:
* non-HA, multi-cluster, Cloudformation, Eucalyptus DNS, Load balancer enabled
** 1 x CLC, DNS, Cloudformation
** 1 x UFS
** 1 x UFS, Walrus
** 2 x CC (Managed), SC
*** 1st cluster - SC (Overlay)
*** 2nd cluster - SC (DAS)
** 2 x NCs for 1st cluster
** 1 x NCs for 2nd cluster
